pages.text: After infusing the Vault Rock to create a Vault Crystal, the player requires a $(l)portal frame$().$(br2)Right-clicking with a $(l)Vault Crystal$() inside the portal opens a gateway to the Vault Dimension.$(br2)The frame can be built out of $(l)any type$() of $(l)Vault Stone.$()

pages.name: Vault Portal
pages.text: The portal may vary in size with a $(l)minimum of 4x5$() and a $(l)maximum of 23x23$().
